name: Love waifu #11 - Locked Temptation
description: Wearing a striped prison uniform, she stands in the middle of the street — hands cuffed, cheeks flushed. The metal glints against her pale skin, wrists gently tugged in front of her. Her green eyes are wide, lips parted in nervous hesitation. Is she embarrassed... or is there something thrilling about being seen like this?

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
